SELECT TDAD_CNOTWORKID, TMG_F_GET_MGD( TDAD_CNOTWORKID, TDAD_DYYYYMMDD, TDAD_CCUSTOMERID, TDAD_CCOMPANYID, #{language} ) TDAD_CNOTWORK_NAME, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(TDAD_NOPEN, 0) AS TDAD_NOPEN, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI(TDAD_NCLOSE, 0) AS TDAD_NCLOSE, TDAD_NDELETEFLG, to_multi_byte(ROWID) AS ROW_ID FROM TMG_DAILY_DETAIL WHERE TDAD_CEMPLOYEEID = #{targetUser} AND TDAD_DYYYYMMDD = #{day} AND TDAD_CCOMPANYID = #{compCode} AND TDAD_CCUSTOMERID = #{custID}
AND TDAD_NDELETEFLG = 0
AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT ITEM_CODE FROM TABLE( TMG_F_GET_RESULTITEMS( #{custID}, #{compCode}, NULL, #{day} ) ) WHERE TDAD_CNOTWORKID = ITEM_CODE ) ORDER BY TDAD_NOPEN
AND TDAD_CNOTWORKID = 'TMG_NOTWORK|905'
AND TDAD_CNOTWORKID = 'TMG_NOTWORK|910'
AND TDAD_CNOTWORKID = 'TMG_ITEMS|PlanRest'

SELECT e.EMPID AS TDA_CEMPLOYEEID, TDAD_DYYYYMM, TDAD_DYYYYMMDD, TDAD_CNOTWORKID, TDAD_NOPEN, TDAD_NCLOSE, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI ( TDAD_NOPEN, 0 ) TDAD_NOPEN_TIME, TMG_F_CONV_MIN2HHMI ( TDAD_NCLOSE, 0 ) TDAD_NCLOSE_TIME FROM TMG_DAILY_DETAIL, ( ${employeeListSql}) e WHERE TDAD_CCOMPANYID = #{compId} AND TDAD_CCUSTOMERID = #{custid} AND TDAD_CEMPLOYEEID = e.EMPID AND TDAD_DYYYYMMDD = to_date( #{baseDate}, 'yyyy/mm/dd' ) AND TDAD_CNOTWORKID = 'TMG_ITEMS|ResultRest' AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TMG_DAILY WHERE TDA_CCUSTOMERID = TDAD_CCUSTOMERID AND TDA_CCOMPANYID = TDAD_CCOMPANYID AND TDA_CEMPLOYEEID = TDAD_CEMPLOYEEID AND TDA_DYYYYMMDD = TDAD_DYYYYMMDD AND ( ( TDA_NOPEN_P >= TDAD_NCLOSE OR TDA_NCLOSE_P <= TDAD_NOPEN ) OR ( TDA_NOPEN_P IS NULL OR TDA_NCLOSE_P IS NULL ) ) ) ) ORDER BY TDAD_CEMPLOYEEID, TDAD_NOPEN ;
